dcterms:creator: S. Amrouche
N. Choma
D. Murnane
P. Calafiura
dcterms:description: The TrackML dataset simulates top quark pair production from proton-proton collisions at the Large Hadron Collider. It is used to train a Graph Neural Network (GNN) for pattern recognition in particle physics, where graphs are constructed from collision events, with nodes representing 3D space-point measurements and edges indicating connections between hits.
dcterms:title: TrackML

dcterms:creator: J. Shlomi
P. Battaglia
J.-R. Vlimant
dcterms:description: The Large Hadron Collider data is utilized as a benchmark for training a Graph Neural Network (GNN) to solve a combinatorially hard pattern recognition problem in high energy physics. The dataset contains complex event data from particle collisions.
dcterms:title: Large Hadron Collider data
